event.description: {CovLStrv2{The application invokes `setSkipAllValidators`, `setSkipDefaultAudienceValidation` or `setSkipAllDefaultValidators` to ignore validating JSON Web Token claims. This can be exploited by attackers to reuse an existing JWT signed for other scenarios.}}
{CovLStrv2{Avoid invoking `setSkipAllValidators`, `setSkipDefaultAudienceValidation` or `setSkipAllDefaultValidators` which disable JSON Web Token claims validation.}}

typePropertiesGroup.type: JSON Web Token decoded without claims verification
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: The application invokes `setSkipAllValidators`, `setSkipDefaultAudienceValidation` or `setSkipAllDefaultValidators` to ignore validating JSON Web Token claims. This can be exploited by attackers to reuse an existing JWT signed for other scenarios.
